Key Match Events: Dunith Wellalage dismissed Rohit, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, Axar Patel and Kuldeep Yadav
India chased 249 and were all out for 138
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
India need Shubman Gill to rediscover his 2023 form
India need to keep Sri Lanka's lower middle order quiet
Is it time for a change in India's batting order?
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma hit important boundaries for India but the overall batting performance was poor
Sri Lanka's spinners performed exceptionally well, especially Dunith Wellalage
India's chase of 249 was unsuccessful due to poor batting and lack of runs
This loss marks a disappointing start to India's preparations for Champions Trophy
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 26.1 overs per side
Dunith Wellalage claimed a five-wicket haul (5.1-0-27-5)
